channel.title: Amg! [WEBCLIENT]
channel.description:
After thousands of years trying to get ric914's tutorial to work...
I got this page where it says:
"Cache downloading" blach blah blah
never got that before, I was sooo happy.
Then right after, it said "Client updated please reload" then suddenly "Connection error retying in -5"
Like wtf? I tried reloading! nothing works.
Can someone help? thanks

item.title: Amg! [WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @appletart appletart
item.description:
@appletart wrote:

ahhhhhhhhhhhh! that is probably it.
I’m adding you on msn!

please add mine, cake.rule12@live.com

Read full topic

item.title: Amg! [WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Did you link your background to your webclient ?

Your webclient loads perfectly your caches. That’s ok. Then, it will extract and the first thing the webclient will need to see is your client background or else it won’t load and say retrying thing.

Try this and tell me.

Read full topic

item.title: Amg! [WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @appletart appletart
item.description:
@appletart wrote:

the server is always up though!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Amg! [WEBCLIENT]
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Start the server first before you start up the web client or you will keep on getting the connection error. You’re getting that error because it is not connecting to any IP from the server, therefore, start the server first then the web client.

Read full topic
